name: DesignPodcast
0:
”Alexa, open design podcast”
”Alexa, ask design podcast for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start design podcast”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: design podcast
des: Listen to the latest talks and discoveries from Designed By Us. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next". This skill was created by The DesignedByUs.org Design Corps at Aurora21.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
